text:
Champions League
Real Madrid - Galatasaray: Marcelo evokes his particular 100th
This is a small personal best for the Brazilian left-back who will play the 100th match of his career in the Champions League.
05 Nov 2019, 20:41 by Rafael Da Silva



Eden HazardClub previous: ChelseaCompensation: 100 million eurosIcon Sport



Luka JovicClub previous: Eintracht FrankfurtIndemnity: 60 million eurosIcon Sport



Eder Militao Previous club: FC PortoCompensation: 50 million eurosIcon Sport



Ferland MendyClub previous: Olympique LyonnaisIndemnity: 48 million eurosIcon Sport



RodrygoClub previous: SantosCompensation: 45 million eurosIcon Sport



Alphonse AreolaClub previous: Paris Saint-GermainIndemnity: none (ready) Icon Sport



Takefusa KuboClub previous: FC TokyoIndemnity: noneIcon Sport

Real Madrid: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




Tomorrow night, Real Madrid hosts Galatasaray for the fourth pool match. After winning in Istanbul in the first leg (1-0), the men of Zinedine Zidane will be forced to win in order to validate his qualification in the round of 16. A match more than particular for Marcelo.




"It's a pride"




Marcelo currently has 493 games with Real Madrid since 2007 + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Indeed, the Brazilian left-back, at the club since 2007, will play his 100th encounter in the Champions League. A moment that the Auriverde is waiting for a firm footing as he explained in a press conference: "It is a pride to play so many games for the biggest club in the world. I am here almost all my life. It's really a pride and it's expected to be a big challenge, "he said.
